title: Fix your game
body: i was playing ranked and winning it, it was like a 90% win but for nothing i dc, but meanwhile i was talking with a freind on skype and the connection there was fine and everything, hell i was even able to play videos on yt.. but wasnt able to connect back on the client, said i had problems with my connections but everything was fine on my side... soo riot made me lose my ranked game... please fix your game soo i can play it.

replies.body:
I see no record of service issues today on EUNE. Note that each server or service you access (youtube, skype, League, Google) are all located in different geolocations and your network route to each server takes different pathways or nodes. This means you could have a good connection to one server, but run into routing issues to another.

I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as local network configurations have the highest chance of causing connectivity issues in League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your problem.
